subjectArea.name: HCM - Workforce Rewards - Salary Basis
subjectArea.description: Provides information on worker's salary details, salary ranges, off-cycle salary changes and supporting historical trends. Further it also provides view of worker's performance and salary change percentages.
subjectArea.implicitFactColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Salary Basis.Implicit Fact Measure
